description:
On any given day, every moment matters to someone, somewhere. And every moment, Motorola Solutions' innovations, products, and services play essential roles in people's lives.

We keep utility workers connected and visible to each other with real-time voice and data communication across the smart grid. And we provide the situational awareness first responders need when a moment brings catastrophe.

We do this by connecting them to seamless communication networks, applications and services, by providing them with real-time information, and by arming them with intuitive, nearly indestructible radios and devices.

We help people be their best in the moments that matter. This is our purpose. 

  


Our Commitment to Workplace Gender Equity

"This year I became a Pay Equity Ambassador for the Workplace Gender Equity Agency.

Though we are committed to making positive changes to address the pay imbalance at Motorola Solutions Australia, we still have much work to do. I am optimistic that we are making continued progress and we will achieve our goals.

As a Pay Equity Ambassador, I want to help bring about positive change both inside and outside of our company and to use social media and other channels to continue this important discussion.

As employers we must recognise that gender bias can creep into overall performance, and as a result, can impact further career development.

The team at Motorola Solutions Australia and I are advocating for #EqualPay."

- Steven Crutchfield, Vice President & Managing Director – Australia & New Zealand 


Health and Wellbeing

The BEING Motorolan Team actively works to "Promote health, happiness, security and connectedness, to build a working environment that encourages Motorolans to make positive changes."

At Motorola we promote health and wellbeing through a number of initiatives including the Employee Assistance Program, annual influenza vaccination program, prayer room, mental health first aid training, work flexibility, walking and running groups, in-house yoga, corporate gym memberships and by facilitating various presentations and tip sheets throughout the year on health and wellbeing. 


Flexible Working Arrangements

Motorola Solutions endeavours to assist its employees achieve their personal, family and relationship goals by facilitating flexibility in employment and working arrangements to achieve the optimum balance between work and personal responsibilities and acknowledges that employee satisfaction significantly impacts the efficiency of the Company.​ Flexible work arrangements at Motorola  may include variations to work locations, work hours and/or work patterns or shifts.​

Inclusion & Diversity at Motorola

Motorola Solutions Australia and New Zealand – Inclusion & Diveristy Council values and promotes the advancement of diversity and inclusion in all forms - including in relation to age, culture, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, race, religious background and sexual orientation.
